frontmatter.title: How AI Can Replace Visual Artists
frontmatter.description: Here is a controversial thought: artificial intelligence can create beautiful paintings *just* as well as humans can.

frontmatter.title: Why the art world needs a better platform for conversations about art
frontmatter.description: As we all become more and more digital, you may be wondering how the art world is keeping up. Emil, the founder of Visit My Studio, shares his view on whatâ€™s currently missing from the industry and how his startup is attempting to fill that gap.
